page.title: 13INFORMATION, LAW & ORDER
page.content: A free information service is available to those people with teletext television sets which provides news and information which is of particular use to those who live in a village environment. News can also be obtained from the radio and the national and local press.Magazines covering a wide selection of topics, sports, hobbies etc.are available from the Stationers in Woburn Sands. Law and Order is maintained by the Ampthill Police Division using motor cycle and car patrols. There is no resident police officer. At Ampthill there is a Magistrate's Court and the nearestCrown Court is in Bedford where there is also a prison. Although robberies and petty crimes have been reported the local inhabitants are generally law-abiding.
